name: Street City Driving Car
description:
Beautiful graphics with realistic scenarios will make the game an addictive one for all those who love to drive. Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. Drive and drift with a manual transmission, with clutch and stick shift! This is a game that will not only test your skills in controlling the car but also need full attention to traffic rules. we offer you realistic offroad and racing experience at a high level. But it is not just about killing some time.

Features:
- Realistic damage system
- Stunning world scenarios
- Many achievements to get
- Realistic car physics
- Easy and smooth car controls
- Realistic car driving
- Detailed vehicle interiors
- Lots of challenges to complete
- Detailed open world environment.
